entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
